extendedInfo.description: ââ¦ bright graphics, excellent sound, good sense of humor, and vast re-playability will keep fans of the genre happy for some time." â 148Apps"â¦the brightly coloured worldâ¦ is endearingâ¦ it's fun to pop into for a quick mission." â Pocket Gamer"It plays and looks great, it has plenty of content and charm, and you can play it wherever you are, be it on your desktop or your phone.â - GamezeboGet ready for the best FREE dungeon crawler ever! Create a character, grab a Buddy (or two) from your friendsâ character lineup, and go forth on Missions as you thwack ugly Oblins and other creepy-crawlies!Buddy Rush is a cross-platform, action role-playing game (RPG) developed for Facebook.Connect with your Facebook account and play through your internet browser or on your Android device.Youâll adventure through a beautifully rendered 3D world, taking along buddies that arenât just generic NPCs â theyâre computer-controlled characters that your Facebook Friends have created!Earn experience points for Buddies just for bringing them along on Missions, and earn experience points for your own character just for getting taken along in your friendsâ own adventures!The full FREE game features:- A cute isometric 3D world to grab loot and level up in!- 15 customizable characters: Choose a class and customize outfits, armor and weapons to help improve your characterâs talents and increase the chance that your friends will select your Buddy for their next Mission!- Play with your friendsâ Buddy character: Form groups for Missions and Dungeons by selecting from Facebook friendsâ existing Buddies. Reward their Buddy with experience for bringing them along and theyâll return the favor by inviting your Buddy for their own adventures!- 10 different Chapters and 92 Missions: Each Chapter presents a new environment and soundtrack, with fresh objectives, monsters and bosses to overcome.- Over 2000 items: Earn items that make your Buddy stronger by completing challenging Missions, Dungeons and Challenges, or by purchasing in the store.Coming Soon! More Chapters, Missions, Characters and Gears.Like and Play us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/buddyrushWatch us on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/buddyrushFollow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/buddyrush---------------------------------------------------------------------A FACEBOOK ACCOUNT is required.---------------------------------------------------------------------Minimum requirements:800x480 resolution / Android 2.2 Froyo---------------------------------------------------------------------Tested devices:Google Nexus OneGoogle Nexus SSamsung Galaxy SSamsung Galaxy S IIHTC DesireHTC Desire HDHTC Desire ZHTC Droid Incredible---------------------------------------------------------------------

reviews.title: Just one problem....
reviews.comment: I just have one problem. The first time I used Buddy Rush was in my laptop using my Facebook account. When it finished loading , Dumba greeted me and told me to click \"create new\" ... I clicked create new and I made my character , but the game crashed and so I refreshed my page and the same thing happened again. I created my second character and the page crashed again! And now everytime I open Buddy Rush , Dumba keeps saying the introduction message and I didn\'t get to get the chips Dumba said I\'ll get.
reviews.author: Miguel Marquez

reviews.title: Fun but freezes
reviews.comment: Alright, so this is my 3rd time downloading this game. First time it froze at main menu and completely crashed, second time I got to level 10 and it did the same thing but, got so bad I couldn\'t exit the game and had to take out my battery on my phone and put it back in inorder for my phone to work properly again.this is now the third time I have downloaded this game and if this game crashes or does anything to my phone again, I WILL NOT download this game or any game by these people EVER AGAIN!!!
reviews.author: Alexis DiPietro

reviews.title: HELP PLEASE
reviews.comment: I accidently deleted my one and only char. Now i cant create any char. It says 20 chips but i dont have money to buy it,I dont have any more char. Slot,and char. PLEASE HELP! Also a good game, a must download, smooth gameplay and fun Bgm.It also works very perfectly in my S3 with no lag, Keep up the good work Rush team! :)
